title: May 2022 Android security update rolls out to Google Pixel and some Samsung Galaxy phones
content:
It’s the first Monday of the month, which means it’s time for another security update. Google today published the May 2022 Android Security Bulletin, and with it, the May 2022 security update for eligible Pixel smartphones. Google’s Pixel lineup aren’t the only devices getting the update today, though, as Samsung also followed in Google’s footsteps

The post May 2022 Android security update rolls out to Google Pixel and some Samsung Galaxy phones appeared first on XDA.
description: Google has published the Android Security Bulletin for May 2022, and they've also started rolling out the security update to Pixel phones.
